tool.name: CNVkit Call
tool.description: Given segmented log2 ratio estimates (.cns), derive each segment’s absolute integer copy number
tool.command:
ln -s '$input_sample_file' ./tumor.cns && #if $additional_SNP_allelic_process.vcf ln -s '$additional_SNP_allelic_process.vcf' ./vcf_file.vcf && #end if cnvkit.py call ./tumor.cns #if $advanced_settings.method == "threshold" #set $method_val = "threshold" --method '$method_val' #else --method '$advanced_settings.method' #end if
#if $advanced_settings.center == "cbs" #set $center_val = "cbs" --center '$center_val' #else --center '$advanced_settings.center' #end if --thresholds'$advanced_settings.thresholds' --center-at '$advanced_settings.center_at' --filter '$advanced_settings.filter' --ploidy $advanced_settings.ploidy --purity $advanced_settings.purity #if '$advanced_settings.drop_low_coverage' --drop-low-coverage #end if --sample-sex '$advanced_settings.sample_sex' #if '$advanced_settings.male_reference' --male-reference #end if #if $additional_SNP_allelic_process.vcf --vcf ./vcf_file.vcf #end if --sample-id '$additional_SNP_allelic_process.sample_id' --normal-id '$additional_SNP_allelic_process.normal_id' --min-variant-depth $additional_SNP_allelic_process.min_variant_depth --zygosity-freq $additional_SNP_allelic_process.normal_id
tool.help: Given segmented log2 ratio estimates (.cns), derive each segment’s absolute integer copy number
